channel.title: Program to make a game and Game Source (NO RS PRIVATE SERVER SOURCES)
channel.description:
Which program do you think is best to make a game? ===EDIT=== And can i get a source?
Shooting or a car game. OR arcade. ==========

item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

“I want a source” = “i want someone else to write the game and then I want to say I did it”

Get out.

item.title: Program to make a game and Game Source (NO RS PRIVATE SERVER SOURCES)
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“chrham2, post:3, topic:266040”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=351255.msg2696969#msg2696969 date=1236357310]
In the end, you write your own.
[/quote]!??[/quote]

If you are making a serious game, you’ll find that the programs you use don’t match your needs completely. So you write your own.

Read full topic
item.source: Program to make a game and Game Source (NO RS PRIVATE SERVER SOURCES)

item.title: Program to make a game and Game Source (NO RS PRIVATE SERVER SOURCES)
item.dc:creator: @chrham2 chrham2
item.description:
@chrham2 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:6, topic:266040”]http://www.gamedev.net/
http://www.devmaster.net/
Everything you wish to learn about developing games can be found at these two links.

Check out http://www.devmaster.net/engines/

Let me lay this out to you. There is no program where you enter a few details and press a few buttons and bam it spits out neat source code, and compiles into a WoW clone.

I can’t understand your question though. Please take the time to ask questions clearly, as we take our time to read and respond.

So if I’m reading your post right you want a program that will make games.
I suggest you learn C++, but here are some options:

http://www.yoyogames.com/ - Game Maker
http://www.garagegames.com/ - Torque game engine. At least learn the scripting language in this program if you want anything worth playing at all
http://tkool.jp/products/rpgxp/eng/ - rpg maker xp

But anyways these programs aren’t going to give you source code afterwards. I don’t think such software exists.[/quote]

I meant a source OR a program, not a program which gives a source.

Read full topic
item.source: Program to make a game and Game Source (NO RS PRIVATE SERVER SOURCES)

item.title: Program to make a game and Game Source (NO RS PRIVATE SERVER SOURCES)
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

GameDev.net - your game development community

GameDev.net - Your Game Development Community - GameDev.net

GameDev.net is your game development community. Learn, share, and connect with gamedevs around the world.


http://www.devmaster.net/
Everything you wish to learn about developing games can be found at these two links.

Check out http://www.devmaster.net/engines/

Let me lay this out to you. There is no program where you enter a few details and press a few buttons and bam it spits out neat source code, and compiles into a WoW clone.

I can’t understand your question though. Please take the time to ask questions clearly, as we take our time to read and respond.

So if I’m reading your post right you want a program that will make games.
I suggest you learn C++, but here are some options:

http://www.yoyogames.com/ - Game Maker
http://www.garagegames.com/ - Torque game engine. At least learn the scripting language in this program if you want anything worth playing at all
http://tkool.jp/products/rpgxp/eng/ - rpg maker xp

But anyways these programs aren’t going to give you source code afterwards. I don’t think such software exists.

Read full topic

!??
[/quote]

That means you start from stratch with a decent language like C#, C++, Java ect and make the whole game. (including the boring bits)[/quote]
Really? I want a source then.

Read full topic
